meanings.sent1: I visited many booteries in town to find the perfect pair of boots.
meanings.sent2: The booteries in the mall offer a wide selection of footwear.
meanings.sent3: The booteries were so crowded that I felt like I was in a shoe zoo!
meanings.sent4: Her closet looked like a bootery with rows of neatly lined up boots.
meanings.sent5: The smell of leather in the booteries always reminds me of adventure.

meanings.definition: Booteries: places where boots are sold
meanings.sent1: The small town had only a few booteries, but they had quality products.
meanings.sent2: Tourists often visit the local booteries to buy souvenirs.
meanings.sent3: The booteries in that area are so popular, they should have a bootery mascot!
meanings.sent4: Walking into the booteries felt like stepping into a treasure trove of footwear.
meanings.sent5: The neon sign outside the booteries glowed invitingly in the evening.
